Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of the Human Meteor and Initial Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and the initial underwater setting, transitioning to Duke O'Dowd's taxi driver persona and the emerging mystery surrounding the waterfront and suspicious characters.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor underwater, setting the stage with divers and hinting at a threat.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd as taxi driver, encounters suspicious passengers and becomes aware of being followed.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ride to the Waterfront and Suspicion
Arrival at the Pier and Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Street Confrontation and Hospital Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts 'cop shooters', gets injured, and learns about a yacht and submarine plot while in the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Revelation of Yacht and Submarine Plot
Duke's Plan and Toby's Stowaway Mission

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Submarine Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as Toby, investigates the yacht, discovers the submarine plot, and is revealed to be part of a planned operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Sudden Fall

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Torpedo Action
sub_scenes.description: Namor intervenes underwater, discovers the torpedo operation, and prepares for confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery and Underwater Encounter
Subduing a Diver and Submarine's Evasion
Confrontation with the Red Suit Diver and Underwater Struggle

sub_scenes.title: Surface Ship Attack and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Action shifts to the ship's perspective, showing the impact of the underwater attack and leading to Namor's surface attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Surface Attack on the Ship with Torpedo

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Pursuit and Peter's Death Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Namor pursues the yacht and then investigates Peter's death, uncovering espionage and confirming Peter's betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter in Diving Helmet
Investigation in Peter's Cabin and Jap Navy Connection
Confirmation of Peter's Double Life and Swift Action
Driving Toby Home After a Long Day
Arriving Home and Mother's Concern for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends and the Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads confronting Nazi Fiends, and then shifts to a separate scene with boys observing an ambulance and investigating a dropped wallet, leading to a new mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Liberty Lads confronting Nazi Fiends, setting up a conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Clue
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe an ambulance, investigate a dropped wallet, and find a clue leading to a garage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue

sub_scenes.title: Garage Observation and Major Bronson Mystery
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe marines and Major Bronson at the garage, deepening the mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Police Interception and Mr. Horst Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Boys are intercepted by police, taken to a building, and captured by Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys while his men plot to eliminate them using carbon monoxide.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Rescue and Garage Fight
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson intervenes, a violent fight erupts, and the boys are told to escape amidst the chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help
The Marines Engage in a Scrap
Urgent Medical Aid for the Major

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ's South American Adventure and Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in South America, where they are caught in intrigue and become involved in the kidnapping of the President's daughter, Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to The Champ and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'The Champ' story and setting in a sleepy South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting the Scene
Arrival in a Sleepy South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Champ is interrogated by officers, and the kidnapping of Rosita by El Tigre is revealed.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Journey and Rescue Mission Initiation
sub_scenes.description: Men are forced into a car, leading to a house where a rescue mission for Rosita begins.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Revelation at the House

sub_scenes.title: Stealthy Infiltration and Confrontation with El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: A group approaches El Tigre's hideout, uses diversion tactics, infiltrates, and confronts El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Initial Attack on Axis Forces
Seeking Refuge and Planning Entry via Rear
Machine Gun Deployment and Presidential Orders
Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan and his jungle combat against spies, leading to a betrayal and a new alliance with native tribes.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Grave Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat, followed by a grave report about disobedience and compromised plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Report and Canal Zone Discussion
Dolan's Displeasure and Sub Detector Plans

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Tracking and Native Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dolan tracks through the jungle, evades a dart attack, and is then swarmed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Captured men are interrogated and forced to write a note, leading to a betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Fatherland's Demand and Hot Iron Threat

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Jungle Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan expresses regret, a fire is set, and Dolan forms a new alliance with the natives after their chief's death.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Decision and American Brawlers
sub_scenes.description: Captain decides to surrender, leading to a surprise encounter and a brawl with 'American brawlers'.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them through newspaper offices, police stations, and hospitals to uncover a complex plot involving racketeering and blood transfusion needs.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins Story
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their backstory.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Assignment and Initial Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane are assigned to investigate the banker's murder and begin gathering initial information.

narrative_arcs.title: Information from Sailor and Headquarters Decision
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Press Passes and Revelation of Sick Child

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Revelation and Candy Store Lead
sub_scenes.description: Hospital reveals blood transfusion need, and investigation leads to candy store phone call and new direction.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call and New Lead
Arrival in the Irish Section and Pursuit of Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane inquire in the Irish section and learn the truth from Mrs. Murphy about Reilly's innocence and Farnacci's scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Information in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Chase, Roadblock, and Street Brawl
sub_scenes.description: A chase ensues, leading to a roadblock and a street brawl.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and De-escalation at the Roadblock

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Blood Transfusion Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Medical emergency response, community blood drive, forced blood donation from Farnacci, and celebration of Reilly's daughter's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Emergency Medical Response and Hospital Wait
Blood Transfusion Need and Community Blood Drive
Blood Type Matching and Transfusion Preparation
Blood Transfusion in Progress and Doctor's Reassurance
Demand for Farnacci's Blood and Police Plan
Police Raid and Arrest of Farnacci
Birthday Celebration for Reilly's Daughter's Recovery
